modName: Undeath - Hooded White Lich with Patterned Cape (All Liches)
summary: Enabled the hooded Lich model from Undeath mod with the white lich texture replacer (for the Fleshy Lich) for all colours. Optional Red and Black textures are in actor/dragonpriest/optional folder
descriptionHtml: Enables the hooded Lich model with the White Lich texture replacer (for the Fleshy Lich) for all colours. Also changed the texture of the Green veil to white and edited its name in the esp.
author: SpiritWarden
